rukus.text: Ya Ma`shara Al-Jinni Wa Al-'Insi 'Alam Ya'tikum Rusulun Minkum Yaqussuna `Alaykum 'Aya Ti Wa Yundhirunakum Liqa'a Yawmikum Hadha Qalu Shahidna `Ala 'Anfusina Wa Gharrat/humu Al-Haya Atu Ad-Dunya Wa Shahidu `Ala 'Anfusihim 'Annahum Kanu Kafirina
Dhalika 'An Lam Yakun Rabbuka Muhlika Al-Qura Bizulmin Wa 'Ahluha Ghafiluna
Wa Likullin Darajatun Mimma `Amilu Wa Ma Rabbuka Bighafilin `Amma Ya`maluna
Wa Rabbuka Al-Ghaniyu Dhu Ar-Rahmati 'In Yasha' Yudh/hibkum Wa Yastakhlif Min Ba`dikum Ma Yasha'u Kama 'Ansha'akum Min Dhurriyati Qawmin 'Akharina
Inna Ma Tu`aduna La'atin Wa Ma 'Antum Bimu`jizina
Qul Ya Qawmi A`malu `Ala Makanatikum 'Inni `Amilun Fasawfa Ta`lamuna Man Takunu Lahu `Aqibatu Ad-Dari 'Innahu La Yuflihu Az-Zalimuna

Wa Ja`alu Lillahi Mimma Dhara'a Mina Al-Harthi Wa Al-'An`am Nasibaan Faqalu Hadha Lillahi Biza`mihim Wa Hadha Lishuraka'ina Fama Kana Lishuraka'ihim Fala Yasilu 'Ila Allahi Wa Ma Kana Lillahi Fahuwa Yasilu 'Ila Shuraka'ihim Sa'a Ma Yahkumuna
Wa Kadhalika Zayyana Likathirin Mina Al-Mushrikina Qatla 'Awladihim Shuraka'uuhum Liyurduhum Wa Liyalbisu `Alayhim Dinahum Wa Law Sha'a Allahu Ma Fa`aluhu Fadharhum Wa Ma Yaftaruna

Wa Qalu Hadhihi 'An`amun Wa Harthun Hijrun La Yat`amuha 'Illa Man Nasha'u Biza`mihim Wa 'An`amun Hurrimat Zuhuruha Wa 'An`amun La Yadhkuruna Asma Allahi `Alayha Aftira'an `Alayhi Sayajzihim Bima Kanu Yaftaruna
Wa Qalu Ma Fi Butuni Hadhihi Al-'An`ami Khalisatun Lidhukurina Wa Muharramun `Ala 'Azwajina Wa 'In Yakun Maytatan Fahum Fihi Shuraka'u Sayajzihim Wasfahum 'Innahu Hakimun `Alimun
Qad Khasira Al-Ladhina Qatalu 'Awladahum Safahaan Bighayri `Ilmin Wa Harramu Ma Razaqahumu Allahu Aftira'an `Ala Allahi Qad ƒêallu Wa Ma Kanu Muhtadina
